description.value:
This crooked staff is made from twisting acacia wood and has a sphere of rough sandstone embedded in the top, to channel the magic of the desert. When wielding this staff in deserts, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Subsist, Track, and Cover Tracks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from the staff's list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Know Direction]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Create Water], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pass Without Trace]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Endure Elements], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enhance Victuals]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Remove Disease], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Wind]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Air Walk]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Elemental Form]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Flesh to Stone], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stone to Flesh]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fiery Body]
  • 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Horrid Wilting], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wind Walk]
  • 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Storm of Vengeance]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells
